attributes.action: make it law for dog owners to keep their dogs on leash in any public place
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My dog is always kept on leash however was attacked by two off-leash dogs which was unprovoked and unexpected by all parties. Myself and my dog are now very nervous about going out. Dog owners think they know their dogs but they are animals afterall and very unpredictable. This law works well in America
